name: Banshee
trait:
The Banshee is always a female Ghostmodel and name

Banshees often wander toward their target when roaming, although it can't roam to a different floor.

If you point a Parabolic Microphone at a Banshee, there is a small chance to hear a special scream.

A Banshee is more likely to sing during ghost events. These will drain extra 5% sanity on the Banshee's target.

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity, **but it only checks their target's sanity % for initiating a hunt in multiplayer!**
ability:
**The Banshee will prioritize and target a player**
The Banshee will only hunt the target. If the target is not in the house, it can hunt other players instead, **without choosing a new target.**
If the target dies, the Banshee will choose a new target.
